title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: Emre Can (Turkish pronunciation: [ˈemɾe ˈdʒan]; born 12 January 1994) is a German professional footballer who plays for Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund, which he captains, and the Germany national team.

title: Emre Can – Exceptional talent at Borussia Dortmund and Germany's national team
snippet: I could not have wished for a better club in this crucial phase of my life and career. Because of my Turkish background, I was not only able to play for Germany, but also for Turkey.
